attributes.action: Campaign for the safe return of Pete’s beret
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the freedom loving beret wearers of Southern England hereby lobby the Government to put right the injustice of the free world and campaign for the safe return of Pete’s beret (complete with antique brass cap badge).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
